Hi all

I have started using junit and the documentation is pretty good to 
start writing testcases for generic java classes.

Now to write testcases for Servlets,do I jump to httpunitest or stay 
with junit ?

Kindly throw some light in this regard
Anand
subject: Servlet Testing - junit or httpunit
